stories.Title: EU steps forward in AI regulation
stories.Description: Lawmakers have passed the first draft of the comprehensive AI Act with stricter obligations on foundation models and copyright rules for generative AI.
stories.Tweet: EU steps forward in AI regulation 📦 Lawmakers have passed the first draft of the comprehensive AI Act with stricter obligations on foundation models and copyright rules for generative AI. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/eu-lawmakers-pass-draft-of-ai-act-includes-last-minute-change-on-generative-ai-models/

stories.Title: Microsoft Designer just got better!
stories.Description: The graphic design tool is now natively built into Edge, enabling easy social media sharing and AI-powered text generation that can take your projects to the next level.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft Designer just got better! 📦 The graphic design tool is now natively built into Edge, enabling easy social media sharing and AI-powered text generation that can take your projects to the next level. #microsoft https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/27/23700364/microsoft-designer-update-ai-edge-browser-social-media-tools

stories.Title: Walmart is getting the best of AI
stories.Description: The retail company is reportedly using an AI chatbot to negotiate deals with suppliers, and most of them seem to be satisfied with the experience.
stories.Tweet: Walmart is getting the best of AI 📦 The retail company is reportedly using an AI chatbot to negotiate deals with suppliers, and most of them seem to be satisfied with the experience. #ai https://gizmodo.com/walmart-ai-chatbot-inflation-gpt-1850385783

stories.Title: Microsoft’s bet on cloud gaming
stories.Description: With its sights set on cloud gaming as the future of the industry, the big tech giant's ambitions have been put on hold by the UK's decision to block its bid for Activision Blizzard.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft’s bet on cloud gaming 📦 With its sights set on cloud gaming as the future of the industry, the big tech giant's ambitions have been put on hold by the UK's decision to block its bid for Activision Blizzard. #microsoft https://www.cnbc.com/2023/04/28/microsofts-big-bet-on-cloud-gaming-is-what-tripped-up-activision-deal.html

stories.Title: Siri keeps lacking behind
stories.Description: Reports indicate that Apple is losing top engineers to Google due to Siri's limitations, an indication of the company's struggle to keep up with the AI race.
stories.Tweet: Siri keeps lacking behind 📦 Reports indicate that Apple is losing top engineers to Google due to Siri's limitations, an indication of the company's struggle to keep up with the AI race. #apple https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-engineers-shirk-siri-to-jump-to-google-report-says-2023-4

stories.Title: Windows 10 is on its way out
stories.Description: After eight years of service, Microsoft has announced that it will be ending support for its operating system in 2025.
stories.Tweet: Windows 10 is on its way out 📦 After eight years of service, Microsoft has announced that it will be ending support for its operating system in 2025. #windows https://www.techtimes.com/articles/290900/20230427/microsoft-saying-goodbye-windows-10-end-support-2025-already-runs.htm

stories.Title: Falcon Heavy gets ready to launch
stories.Description: Following several weather delays, SpaceX is aiming to launch its Falcon Heavy rocket carrying three satellites today.
stories.Tweet: Falcon Heavy gets ready to launch 📦 Following several weather delays, SpaceX is aiming to launch its Falcon Heavy rocket carrying three satellites today. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-falcon-heavy-sixth-mission-launch-viasat-3-americas

stories.Title: SpaceX continues to grow its mission count
stories.Description: Launching today from Cape Canaveral, a Falcon 9 rocket will carry satellites for the telecom company SES.
stories.Tweet: SpaceX continues to grow its mission count 📦 Launching today from Cape Canaveral, a Falcon 9 rocket will carry satellites for the telecom company SES. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-ses-o3b-mpower-3-4-launch-2023

stories.Title: Big problems for ESA’s JUICE mission
stories.Description: The deployment of Juice's ice-penetrating RIME antenna is facing troubles as it is currently stuck and only partially extended. Engineers are working to solve the issue.
stories.Tweet: Big problems for ESA’s JUICE mission 📦 The deployment of Juice's ice-penetrating RIME antenna is facing troubles as it is currently stuck and only partially extended. Engineers are working to solve the issue.  #JUICE https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/04/europes-major-new-interplanetary-spacecraft-has-a-slight-problem/

stories.Title: Voyager 2's mission extended
stories.Description: Thanks to a backup power source, NASA's Voyager 2 will continue its science mission until 2026, defying the test of time.
stories.Tweet: Voyager 2's mission extended 📦 Thanks to a backup power source, NASA's Voyager 2 will continue its science mission until 2026, defying the test of time. #NASA https://www.techtimes.com/articles/290873/20230427/voyager-2s-science-mission-extended-2026-thanks-backup-power-reservoir.htm

stories.Title: CLI tricks for developers
stories.Description: If you're planning to level up your skills, this blog post is filled with CLI tricks and commands that will help you no matter how experienced you are.
